https://www.googleapis.com/auth/sdm.serv.description: See and/or control the devices that you selected

description: Allow select enterprise partners to access, control, and manage Google and Nest devices programmatically.
name: smartdevicemanagement

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

executeCommand.description: Executes a command to device managed by the enterprise.

name.description: The name of the device requested. For example: "enterprises/XYZ/devices/123"

get.description: Gets a device managed by the enterprise.

name.description: The name of the device requested. For example: "enterprises/XYZ/devices/123"

list.description: Lists devices managed by the enterprise.

filter.description: Optional filter to list devices. Filters can be done on: Device custom name (substring match): 'customName=wing'

parent.description: The parent enterprise to list devices under. E.g. "enterprises/XYZ".

get.description: Gets a structure managed by the enterprise.

name.description: The name of the structure requested. For example: "enterprises/XYZ/structures/ABC".

list.description: Lists structures managed by the enterprise.

parent.description: The parent enterprise to list structures under. E.g. "enterprises/XYZ".

get.description: Gets a room managed by the enterprise.

name.description: The name of the room requested. For example: "enterprises/XYZ/structures/ABC/rooms/123".

list.description: Lists rooms managed by the enterprise.

parent.description: The parent resource name of the rooms requested. For example: "enterprises/XYZ/structures/ABC".

GoogleHomeEnterpriseSdmV1Device.description: Device resource represents an instance of enterprise managed device in the property.

name.description: Required. The resource name of the device. For example: "enterprises/XYZ/devices/123".

type.description: Output only. Type of the device for general display purposes. For example: "THERMOSTAT". The device type should not be used to deduce or infer functionality of the actual device it is assigned to. Instead, use the returned traits for the device.

command.description: The command name to execute, represented by the fully qualified protobuf message name.

params.description: The command message to execute, represented as a Struct.

results.description: The results of executing the command.

GoogleHomeEnterpriseSdmV1ParentRelation.description: Represents device relationships, for instance, structure/room to which the device is assigned to.

displayName.description: Output only. The custom name of the relation -- e.g., structure/room where the device is assigned to.

parent.description: Output only. The name of the relation -- e.g., structure/room where the device is assigned to. For example: "enterprises/XYZ/structures/ABC" or "enterprises/XYZ/structures/ABC/rooms/123"

GoogleHomeEnterpriseSdmV1Room.description: Room resource represents an instance of sub-space within a structure such as rooms in a hotel suite or rental apartment.

name.description: Output only. The resource name of the room. For example: "enterprises/XYZ/structures/ABC/rooms/123".

GoogleHomeEnterpriseSdmV1Structure.description: Structure resource represents an instance of enterprise managed home or hotel room.

name.description: Output only. The resource name of the structure. For example: "enterprises/XYZ/structures/ABC".

title: Smart Device Management API
